com.networknt.portal.usermanagement.auth.service

Interface UserService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserServiceImpl

    public interface UserService
    UserService groups functionaries which are needed to manage all the aspects of users.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      User changeEmail(Long userId, String newEmail)
      Changes the User's email address, provided that newEmail is available.
      User changePassword(Long userId, String rawPassword)
      Changes the User's password.
      User changeScreenName(Long userId, String newScreenName)
      Changes the User's screen name, provided that newScreenName is available.
      User confirmEmail(Long userId, String token)
      Confirms the User's email address with the given token, provided that it's valid.
      User confirmPasswordReset(Long userId, String token)
      Confirms the User's previously requested password reset.
      void delete(Long userId)
      Deletes the given User.
      Optional<User> findUser(Long userId)
      Finds a User in the system by its ID.

      Finds a User in the system by its ID.
      User getUser(Long userId)
      Finds a User in the system by its ID.

      Finds a User in the system by its ID.

      Checks if the given email is taken.
      boolean isScreenNameTaken(String screenName)
      Checks if the given screenName is taken.
      User login(String emailOrScreenName, String password)
      Logs a user in with the given emailOrScreenName and password.
      String nextScreenName(String email)
      Returns the next available screen name based on the given email address.

      Request email change for the given user.

      Stores the given User.

      • changeEmail

        User changeEmail(Long userId,
                 String newEmail)
          throws InvalidEmailException,
                 NoSuchUserException
        Changes the User's email address, provided that newEmail is available.
        Parameters:
        userId - User's ID
        newEmail - new email address
        Returns:
        the modified User
        Throws:
        NoSuchUserException - if the user doesn't exist
        InvalidEmailException

        User confirmEmail(Long userId,
                  String token)
           throws InvalidTokenException,
                  NoSuchUserException
        Confirms the User's email address with the given token, provided that it's valid.
        Parameters:
        userId - User's ID
        token - confirmation token
        Returns:
        the modified User
        Throws:
        NoSuchUserException - if the user doesn't exist
        InvalidTokenException - if the given confirmation token is invalid
